title: Verify NAS handles validity is set below minimum allowed value (7)
custom_summary: Verify NAS handles where users attempt to set a validity period below minimum allowed value (7), and provides appropriate error messages then set to default value.
custom_steps:
(Restart service for reloading config, m2)
Set the ECA validity to 5.
Verify how NAS responds and the error message displayed.
(Send Post request for new ECA, m2)
custom_expected:
- NAS detects the invalid ECA validity setting.
- NAS provides a meaningful error message indicating that the validity period must be between 7 and 45 days.
- NAS set the value to default value
